Together, the Bills and Sabres Foundations donated a combined $6,000 to support the Agricultural Pavilion, an installment at Buffalo's Juneteenth Celebration.

The pavilion will be open from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. on both Saturday, June 18 and Sunday, June 19.

#LetsGoBuffalo
No. I can sit back and enjoy it as a fan of the game. I watch a lot of hockey. - RJ

In 2006 in Carolina in the ECF, after the loss I went down to the dressing room, which I never do, and shook players hands. I got to Ryan Miller, he looked at me and I looked at him and we both started crying. - RJ
There have been some dandy names. I don't have one that sticks out right now. - RJ
I have no idea. I'm going to have to muddle my way through it. - RJ
Ooh, that's tough. I think of the fog game where I couldn't see what was going on. Any time the Sabres won big games, I would label those as favorites. - RJ
We're going to Florida with family! - RJ
I did, until I got to the point where it was easier to broadcast than play. - RJ
Rob Ray - RJ
I think about my whole career. It encapsulates everything that I have worked for. - RJ
I admired the greatest players in the game like Bobby Orr, Perreault, Howe, but I wouldn’t pick one favorite. - RJ
51 years? - RJ
For sight lines, Vancouver. For the crowd, Montreal. - RJ
